Permission.label: Command permission
Permission.tooltip: Set the permission for use of command

PermissionInfo.label: Permission info
PermissionInfo.tooltip:
Leave blank, type a number or the specific users
(like this: User1 User2 User3 User4)

Command.label: Command
Command.tooltip: Change the command for this function

WinChanse.label: Win chanse
WinChanse.tooltip: Chanse for a 1x win (higher = higher probability)

2xWinChanse.label: 2x Win chanse
2xWinChanse.tooltip: Chanse for a 2x win (higher = higher probability)

LossRisk.label: Lose risk
LossRisk.tooltip: Risk for a loss (higher = higher probability)

NoPermissionMessage.value: $(Display), you have no permission to use the command!
NoPermissionMessage.label: No permission
NoPermissionMessage.tooltip: Bot response if no permission to use command

PersonalCooldownMessage.value: $(Display), you have $(CooldownLeft) seconds left on your cooldown!
PersonalCooldownMessage.label: Personal cooldown
PersonalCooldownMessage.tooltip: Bot response if the command is on personal cooldown

ChannelCooldownMessage.value: $(Display), there is a channel cooldown on $(ChannelCooldown) seconds!
ChannelCooldownMessage.label: Channel cooldown
ChannelCooldownMessage.tooltip: Bot response if the command is on channel cooldown

WinMessage.label: Win
WinMessage.tooltip: Bot response on a 1x win message

NotEnoughMessage.value: $(Display), you have a total of $(CurrencyAmount) $(Currency) which means that you are unable to gamble $(Amount) $(Currency)...
NotEnoughMessage.label: Too high
NotEnoughMessage.tooltip: Bot response when user gamble too high

MinGambleMessage.value: $(Display), you are not able to gamble less than $(MinGamble) $(Currency)...
MinGambleMessage.label: Too low
MinGambleMessage.tooltip: Bot response when user gamble too low
